Row.Text: The Altar receives a +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Mountains and Natural Wonders.
+10% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in Settlements with an Altar.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters in Settlements with an Altar.
+5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Units in Rural tiles with an Altar in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations in Settlements with an Altar. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonus.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Camps and Woodcutters in Settlements with an Altar. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonus.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Buildings in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with an Altar.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Fishing Boats in Settlements with an Altar. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonus.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture,[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food,[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold,[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness,[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production, and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on the Altar.
+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Military Units in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with an Altar.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters in Settlements with an Altar.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:WONDER] Wonders in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with an Altar.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training [icon:UNIT_SETTLER] Settlers in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with an Altar.
The Altar receives a +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Coast, Lakes, and Navigable River tiles.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Clay Pits, Mines, and Quarries in Settlements with an Altar. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonus.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in Settlements with an Altar. This Pantheon can be chosen by multiple Civilizations.

+25%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors and [icon:SANCTIONS]Sanctions with an Altar in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital. This Pantheon can be chosen by multiple Civilizations.
